faqs.question: How do I start investing?
faqs.answer: To begin investing, create an account, add funds to your wallet, and choose from various investment options available on our platform.

faqs.question: How much does it cost to use Finvesto?
faqs.answer: Our platform is free to use. We only charge minimal fees on transactions and successful investments.

faqs.question: How to contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team through the 'Contact Us' button in the Help Center, or via any of our support channels.

faqs.question: How can I reset my password if I forget it?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

faqs.question: How do I update my contact information?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Profile', select 'Edit Profile', update your information, and save changes.

faqs.question: How can I update my settings within the application?
faqs.answer: Navigate to 'Settings' from your profile page to manage notifications, security, and other preferences.

faqs.question: How can I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Settings', select 'Account', and click on 'Delete Account'. Follow the confirmation steps to complete the process.

faqs.question: How do I access my expense history?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Transactions' in the main menu to view your complete expense history and filter by date or category.

faqs.question: Can I use the app offline?
faqs.answer: Some features are available offline, but you'll need an internet connection for real-time updates and transactions.
